script.nightmarecraft.angel_vendor_1_2: 在這裡你會想要這個東西。
script.nightmarecraft.angel_vendor_2_1: 時代的英雄! 我是上帝的天使，不要害怕，上帝是派我來給你這東西的。
script.nightmarecraft.angel_vendor_2_2: 你是命運的主人;你是靈魂的船長，不要放棄，永遠不要放棄，繼續戰鬥。時代的英雄!
script.nightmarecraft.angel_vendor_3_1: 你是他愛戴的人，時代的英雄，他對你很滿意
script.nightmarecraft.angel_vendor_4_1: 盡情享受成為時代英雄的樂趣吧!
script.nightmarecraft.angel_vendor_5_1: 你必須堅持下去，時代的英雄! 你必須永不放棄!
script.nightmarecraft.angel_vendor_6_1: 英雄，前面是骷髏王的城堡。小心，你以前從未遇過這樣的事情。保持專注，你可以的!
script.nightmarecraft.captain.marty_1: 喲-嗬-嗬！ 你好啊，年輕人！你可以給我一些錢嗎？
script.nightmarecraft.captain.marty_2: 一艘船!!! 好吧，小混混，你需要它做什麼？
script.nightmarecraft.captain.marty_3: 哈哈哈哈! 啊哈哈哈哈哈! 啊...... 你知道這樣的笑話可能有點太早了，但我也同樣喜歡開懷大笑！
script.nightmarecraft.captain.marty_4: 讓我顫抖吧！ 這隻海狗是認真的！
script.nightmarecraft.captain.marty_4_2: 你給我看一看鑽石盾牌，我就免費給你一艘船。
script.nightmarecraft.captain.marty_4_3: 它將帶你們到骷髏王居住的冰山底部。
script.nightmarecraft.captain.marty_4_4: 但你必須在我之前向我證明你能對付他的攻擊。
script.nightmarecraft.captain.marty_4_5: 否則，你們就滾蛋吧，開這樣的玩笑。
script.nightmarecraft.captain.marty_5: 好吧，把我吹下去，年輕人！
script.nightmarecraft.captain.marty_5_1: 你不只是一個年輕人，但我肯定希望你不會在明天日出時去餵魚。
script.nightmarecraft.captain.marty_5_2: 這是你的廚房，如約而至。祝你們好運!
script.nightmarecraft.captain.marty_6: 好了，你們走吧！ 別在我面前表現得那麼多愁善感。
script.nightmarecraft.captain.marty_6_1: 我不希望產生感情。現在繼續吧!
script.nightmarecraft.chapter_2.general_: 什麼？殺死這片土地上的惡魔是我的命運！
4. Summon Mecha-T-Rex at the summoning altar.
5. Let him run through the traps until his Electrostatic shield is down, then blow the EMP.
Will that kill him?
Ok.
Thank you, I think I know what I'm doing now.
Roger that, General Duncan!
They're no match for me. I will take them out.
Yes sir!
After the shield goes down, I go to the Capitol and take out the shamans. That leads me into the valley where I kill Mecha-T-Rex. Got it!
I'm... sorry...
Okay!
So, get decked out and get some traps, and then come back to you?
But I'm here now, and I'm ready to slay the T-Rex, like we agreed.
I got it.
1. Ice traps and cover with leaves.
2. Electrostatic Harpoon traps with trip wires.
3. Prep the EMP above his head.
I've been expecting you, hero.
That's why I'm not going to let you go see Mech T-Rex.
Not so fast hero, they have significant defense systems with security redundancies!
There are four Bunker Outposts generating power to the shield wall.
Each of them has three dark altars leeching power from the Nether.
Blow them each up with an Extra Potent TNT and get your tail out of there. Four Bunker Outposts, blow up three dark altars in each. Got it?
Good. Once you knock down all four the Dark Shamans' black magic will still be strong.
Follow the path to the southernmost part of the mountains and make your way north into their Capital structure.
It's connected to a cave system that will lead you to every Dark Shaman's cave.
Take them all out, take their Dark Emblem and use all eight to power up the altar in the Capitol.
That will unlock the way into the valley where you will take out Mecha-T-Rex.
Hoo-rah, have at it, Hero!
Now hold on there, champ, like I said, we've got a lot to discuss.
I knew you had it in you, good job!
And I've got you an audience with the king!
Here, take these back and show all three to his Majesty!
Go on! The King doesn't like to be held up!!
And you're not equipped to slay the T-Rex. At least... not yet.
And don't think you can beat him without me anyway, you'll never find him.
You have to summon him, and only I know how.
I did it last time too. Barely made it out alive.
It's a miracle I'm still here in one piece. But the others, my warriors.....
It's a soldier's highest honor to die for their cause, and they all died with honor!
There's nothin', not one danged thing to be sorry about!!!
The only thing I'm sorry about is that I can't send you in sooner, can't send you in like right now this hot minute!!!
Won't you please come in, make yourself comfortable.
..But we'll get him. Oh that's right, we're going to take him out, just you and me.
And tell you what, I'm going to sit right here and tell you what to do, and you're going to do it, and then you're going to bring me back The Essence of Manipulation!
It's in the spine of that evil reptilian beast!!!
But first you'll have to get to him, and that jungle is just CRAWLING with villains!
It's positively chock-full of evil! Tell you what I want you to do.
Take this, and go to the bakery, get yourself a nice hot cake, the one that lets you mine Emeralds!!!
And give me that Soul of Contagion and All Seeing Eye of Evil while we're doing the whole give each other stuff thing!
There you go. You get yourself those Emeralds, and you come back to me DRIPPING in DIAMONDS!
Positively dripping, absolutely FILTHY rich, okay?
I want to see every piece of armor in FULL DIAMOND.
We have much to discuss.
And I wanna see you with some better weapons. Guns, even. Then you're going to need to get yourself some traps.
NASTY TRAPS! And LOTS OF EM! We're going to take that T-Rex down...
We're not going to make the same mistakes like we did last time, no we're not.
We're going to knock him dead, shock him so hard he's stone cold dead.
Then you're going to crawl into that raggedy faced stanky breath demon's mouth, all the way down into his guts until you reach the tip of his tail.
And you're going to YANK OUT the Essence of Manipulation right out his spine! Then he's going to fall over dead and you'll bring me back the booty.
And don't worry, I'll keep your evil stuff safe until we're done here.
Tell you what else I'm gonna do.
I'm going to get you an audience with the king, you bring me that essence.
I'm going to march right in there, face to face, and I'm gonna tell him how it is.
I know why you're here and what you want, gosh darn it I want it too! Bad! Real bad!
And he's going to let you into his throne room and give you what you deserve...A FLIPPIN' HEROE'S WELCOME!
How about that, hero? Would you like that?
You bet your booty you would.
Spoken like a true soldier, straight to business. I love it! Yes.
You're gonna need this for prep too. Now hop to it.
HERO! WHAT IS THIS? YOU THINK YOU CAN FACE THE T-REX WITH THIS SHABBY SET UP? GET YOURSELF THE REST, AND DON'T COME BACK TO ME UNTIL IT'S DONE!
Sniff...sniff.... Wow, just look at you!!
All geared up and ready for battle.
The last time I saw someone with gear this powerful was our... aw now don't make me say it.
Prince Benjamin was like a son to me!!
But what you're up against next is no joke, it's SERIOUS. BUSINESS!
I looked after him since he joined the service at age fifteen!!!
Now look at him, six feet under...
I know, I know. Yep, you're right.
It's business time, not time for tears and sniffling, no sir-ee!
Let's talk business, we have a serious operation ahead of us and you?
You've got a lot of hurdles to overcome to get us there, so listen up real good, Hero!
You need to slow him down, a lot.
Every trap stacks against his speed and makes him more vulnerable to your Electrostatic Harpoon Traps.
Place your traps where the valley gets thinnest, just before the second lake, and stock them with ice arrows.
Cover all of your traps with leaves or he'll see them and torch your whole operation!*
Maybe you think you're hot stuff slaying the Zombie Lord and Skeleton King, but I'll tell ya they're wimp stuff compared to what's coming up next for you! WIMP STUFF!!!
Mecha-T-Rex is built to annihilate armies.
He won't see you as much of a threat and you aren't his real master, so he's just going to try to go back to sleep in the other lake across the valley as soon as you wake him.
Set up your EHTs with trip wires about midway up his body where you expect him to hit your traps.
ou need enough EHTs to take down his shield.
Your EHTs will keep zapping away his Electrostatic Shield as long as the lines remain connected to him.
Make sure you have enough set up that you can burn his shield down to nothing.
When you're ready to fight him, you'll need to summon Mecha-T-Rex.
You'll need to put 12 Eyes of Ender in the summoning Altar.
It's the only way. It's the price of summoning him.
Once you place them on the altar the chest in the middle will unlock.
Now I've lost a lot of men, too many men.
Go inside and then eat the poison mushroom you find there.
It'll weaken you...a whole lot. It's how Prince Benjamin died.
The T-Rex got a head start on him and gobbled him right up, wholesale!
He wasn't prepared to run. But we learned and now we got traps.
Lots of traps.
Let him wade through your sea of traps, drop his shield with your EHTs and then blow up an EMP within five blocks of his head.
My friends over at the superweapon department engineered the EMP to absolutely CRUSH the mechanical systems of Mecha-T-Rex.
You're best setting it up above his big ol head because he don't look up.
Nothing is bigger than Mecha-T-Rex, he don't need to look up!
Big boi is 49 blocks from the base of his feet to the top of his head!
WAY TOO MANY MEN, hero. Do you understand?
Make sure you connect the EMP to your detonator BEFORE you summon him so you're ready to go.
No, Hero. That'll just disable him for a short period of time.
There's nothing in our arsenal that can even scratch him.
You'll need to use the Rocket-Powered Grapping Hook to quickly grapple into his mouth and climb down into his throat.
Make your way all the way to the back of him, into his tail, before the timer runs out and big boi wakes up.
Then, blow it up with an extra-potent TNT to yank the Essence of Manipulation right out of him.
Then bring it back to me to prove you made the kill.
I wrote it all down so you won't forget.
Here's the instructions, a sack of Eyes of Ender for the summoning stone, and the EMP.
I'm also giving you a compass to give to Kevin to get you a map to our hideout on location.
I'm not about to lose you!
Once there, you'll find a radio with a direct line to me.
Call me on it when you get there and I'll help you infiltrate the valley where Mecha-T-Rex lives.
If you lose anything, just radio me and I'll get you what you need.
I think so too. Now off you go, a glorious victory awaits you!
Hero, you made it!
Good. Now you're going to have to go through multiple layers of security to get to Mecha-T-Rex at all.
The Dark Shamans protect him with all their nasty black magic.
They got themselves a shield generator protecting the whole valley.
Once you get in there will be no resistance, but getting through the Dark Shamans barrier is going to be difficult.
There are eight of them, Hero.
script.nightmarecraft.diamond_shard.fair: Hero, have you found any Diamond Shards so far?
Give me one and I will give you a shiny new Diamond Sword instead.
script.nightmarecraft.faerie_adventure.c: Alas, my brother is dead.
I see you brought me what I needed to help you.
I see you are still not finished assembling what I need. Return when it's done!
Good, now one more thing.
We have a Leprechaun problem in the forest.
There are far too many!
Catch some and bring me their pots of gold, then I will have all I need to construct your farm!
I will give you a horse you can tame and a chest full of equippment you need to undergo this adventure.
I will also give you maps to all of the problem areas in the forest.
Travel to those locations and when you arrive, the Leprechauns will appear to do their nasty business.
To catch the Leprechauns, you will need Small Nets and Empty Crates.
When you arrive at one of the locations, hold the Empty Crate in your off hand.
This will anger the Leprechauns and make them throw bottles at you that will make you dizzy.
Avoid the bottles and throw the Small Nets back at the Leprechauns to catch them.
When you hit them with the net, a Leprechaun in a Crate will appear on the ground instead and one of the Empty Crates in your offhand will be consumed.
The map to that location will dissapear once you have caught all the Leprechauns there.
The nets and crates I will provide should be enough, but be midnful of your resources and gather the nets you throw around.
Be swift and see you soon, Hero.
I see these are all the items I needed to construct your farm.
This is still not enough for me to construct your farm. Return when you have enough.
The vial you hold contains his blood and is the proof we needed to lay him to rest in our hearts.
Let's go and see if you like where the farm will be.
It should be done by the time you arrive home.
Thank you hero and good luck on your path.
May I please have it in remembrance of him?
Thank you.
We have been watching you from afar, Hero of The Ages.
There are whispers of your adventure.
If you would have us aid you, assemble the following ingredients and bring them to the magical garden in the forest.
I will come find you when it's done.
You have come!
script.nightmarecraft.faerie_adventure.f: Listen closely Hero for two paths you can choose
You'll have to bring your armor and give your sword a swing
For nothing can prepare you for that which lurks at night
But what you'll find behind the dark will give you wondrous might
Finally it's a farm you need and the forest has just the thing
A centaur in the woods you'll seek and this you must bring
A seed of each plant, egg, and raw meat for your special dish
Don't hesitate or the timer will run out and you won't get your wish
Listen closely Hero, for the hour approaches quick
The evil things the Devil brings will make the people sick
Move quickly as you can, but hurry not your fate
If you should go off your own then time is what you'll lose
Do the work before you before it is too late...
Follow me and do as I ask and you can make it fast
For here I gift adventures three and this is what I ask...
There is a lonely mermaid who lost her lover merman
He is trapped inside a shipwreck that's lost beneath the sand
If you feed the seagulls, they'll leave you a nice gift
Which will take you all the way to the location of the ship
Second is a cave with traps and webs and things
script.nightmarecraft.faerie_adventure.m: My lover is lost! Won't you find him?
You really ARE the Hero of the Ages!
Here, take this, this is what you deserve.
With all my heart, thank you!
The Merman took a lot of damage. Use Divine Dish on him to heal him.
The Merman is taking damage, help him!
I've been gone a long time. Will you lead me back to her?
script.nightmarecraft.goat_lady.goat_lad: STOP! WHO GOES THERE?!
You`ve got that look in your eye. I know that look.
It`s the look I gave the king when I told him I was going to stay here and keep the Zombie Lord at bay.
Yes, my husband.
Indeed.
Some things are more important than luxury and protection, hero.
Some things matter more than your comfort.
I came here to do what is right.
That you shall, Hero.
I know who you are. You are the Hero of The Ages.
Ah.... The Zombie Lord... Yes...
Your coming was foretold by the Angels.
You were sent by God Himself.
You don`t have to.
All you need do is believe in the love in your heart.
That is where God lives.
The Zombie Lord is a terrible foe, Hero. You will not defeat him until you drain him of his power.
He is a sick, rotten corpse. He is pure sickness and evil.
It is all I can do to keep him contained and not choke on contagion.
You will need Thor, God of Thunder! in order to defeat his hordes.
Gather them up nice and thick, and then strike with your sword.
He is held prisoner in the crater just south of here.
Slay them. Slay them all, Hero!
And then, when his hordes are culled, dash up to his high place and cut him down.
Move fast, Hero, for his strength gathers quickly!
He spits toxic, festering, contagion.|Use your shield in your offhand to block him.
Keep your wits about you and don`t be fooled by his lies.
He`s a sick creature, Hero. He must be slain.
If you need some more Thor, God of Thunder!, come back here, and I`ll whip you up another batch.
Hero... Good luck!
Look for the love in your heart...
I have been keeping him at bay for many years now.
My goats keep me good company.
Defeat? There is no defeating this evil.
He`s too strong... far too strong.
It`s best that you just run along home now.|There`s no need for more bloodshed...
No need for more loss. I don`t know if my old bones can take any more loss...
There is fire in your veins, young adventurer.
script.nightmarecraft.goat_lady.player_1: A young adventurer seeking the support of an ally of|the People`s Kingdom.
Let me help you. I will defeat the Zombie Lord.
I`m not sure that I believe in God or Angels...
script.nightmarecraft.goat_lady.player_2: The Potions Master gave me this to bring to you.
script.nightmarecraft.goat_lady.player_3: She said you could help me defeat the Zombie Lord.
script.nightmarecraft.goat_lady.player_4: Let me help you. I will defeat him.
script.nightmarecraft.goat_lady.player_5: I am going to face him. Will you help me?
script.nightmarecraft.goat_lady.player_7: That makes you... You`re the queen?! Your Majesty!
script.nightmarecraft.goat_lady.player_8: Why leave the protection of the castle and the luxury of the palace for goats and a rocky cave?
script.nightmarecraft.goat_lady.player_9: So you came here to protect your people.
script.nightmarecraft.guard_1: Stop! What business do you have here, stranger?
script.nightmarecraft.guard_2: Ah, business you say? What business could you have here?
script.nightmarecraft.guard_3: I see. Give me some of this food, and then we shall see if I will let you pass!
script.nightmarecraft.guard_8: I hope to purchase more of your Divine Dish soon!
script.nightmarecraft.intro_1: "又看見一條大紅龍，有七個頭，十個角，頭上有七個冠冕
script.nightmarecraft.intro_10: 他要求一切，而作為回報，他提供空虛。
script.nightmarecraft.intro_11: 如果你服從並接受他為你的主人，他將奴役你，並有計劃地消滅你體內最後一絲溫暖。
script.nightmarecraft.intro_12: 他將使你下跪，在你生命的最後一息中，永遠停留於此。
script.nightmarecraft.intro_13: 在黑魔王的主宰下，所有人都將作為空洞的屍體在地球上行走，無聲、灼熱地在痛苦中蠕動，當他們過著空虛與無意義的生活時，永遠為他的黑暗帝國服務時。
script.nightmarecraft.intro_14: 沒有人關心他們，但每個人都有一萬個惡魔，他們的皮膚下住著邪惡的黑暗水蛭。在他們的思想裡，日夜腐蝕他們的心，他們將在無盡的痛苦中永遠腐爛
script.nightmarecraft.intro_15: 他將被自己內部發出的巨大力量面前倒下|時代的英雄！
script.nightmarecraft.intro_16: 啟示錄的時間已到來|世界需要一位偉大而傳奇的光明戰士站出來
script.nightmarecraft.intro_18: 征服無法想像的敵人需要有勇氣、力量、毅力、專注和友誼|而許多偉大的英雄已經在邪惡市立的蓬勃發展下失敗了
script.nightmarecraft.intro_19: 在一個充滿財富和奇蹟的神奇世界裡|一個年輕的王國設法將邪惡擋在其強大的門外
script.nightmarecraft.intro_2: 他的尾巴抽出天上三分的星，把它們丟在地上。
script.nightmarecraft.intro_21: With its heroes cut thin, darkness gathers its strength, and the mind and soul of the king of the kingdom teeters on the edge of sickness and death.
script.nightmarecraft.intro_22: Here, the heart of the war will be waged between|the Hero of The Ages and Satan himself.
script.nightmarecraft.intro_23: For The Dark Lord knows that whoever claims final victory in this kingdom will surely claim for themselves all the world...
script.nightmarecraft.intro_3: The great dragon was hurled down - that ancient serpent called Satan, who leads the whole world astray.
script.nightmarecraft.intro_4: He was hurled to the earth and his demons with him."| - Revelation 12:3,9
script.nightmarecraft.intro_6: Prophesy foretells of an end of days where nightmares will wage carnage and terror upon the world, attempting to forever extinguish life itself.
script.nightmarecraft.intro_7: A thunderous war will take place and many will die.
script.nightmarecraft.intro_8: The heart of the world and all those souls that call it home are at stake and the winner will take all.
script.nightmarecraft.intro_9: The Dark Lord cares nothing for those he corrupts, harvesting their eternal souls to do his bidding.
script.nightmarecraft.jade_1: 您好，歡迎來到`寶石與珠寶`！
script.nightmarecraft.jade_10: If you need more, I sell them right here in the shop.
script.nightmarecraft.jade_11: Gemstones are rare, so don`t expect every ore to yield usable gems.
script.nightmarecraft.jade_12: Ok, hope to see you around. Best of luck!
script.nightmarecraft.jade_3: Have you found any gem ores while exploring?
script.nightmarecraft.jade_4: You can put them into a compactor, and it will process the ores into gemstones!
script.nightmarecraft.jade_5: If you find gemstones, I would love to buy them from you for my shop.
script.nightmarecraft.jade_8: I just did inventory and found I have an extra one. Here you go!
script.nightmarecraft.jade_9: Just put your gem ores in the top, and put Redstone Blocks for fuel in the bottom, and let it do its magic.
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_1: Hello stranger. How did you make it past the guards?
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_10: My nona told me a story of an Angel who appeared |a generation after our kingdom was founded.
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_11_1: Even though this land is so rich, the darkness that had fallen upon it|since Master Ender's disappearance was crippling us.
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_12: The people called to the Heavens for help.|They prayed with all their might!
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_13: Then one day, an Angel appeared|on Market Street!
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_15: "Do not be afraid, for I am a messenger of God.
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_15_1: I have come because I have been called by the One |to give you this message."
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_15_2: She said: "The Heavens will one day send you a Hero|who will vanquish evil from the land!
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_15_3: The Hero will come bringing manna from God,|and this is how you will know them."
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_16: Initially, we thought it was our great King,|who erected these fortifications to keep out evil.
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_16_1: Within our castle walls we have survived, thrived even!
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_16_2: It is said the spirit of our founding father, Master Ender, was with our King, bringing him to safety from the brink of death, only to rise to greatness as our King!
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_16_3: But alas, our King has been unable to vanquish evil from these lands.|He can only keep out the evil from these walls. Nothing more...
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_17: Many, many great warriors have died attempting to vanquish the monsters of the land. All who have tried have failed...
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_18: Do not worry, for you are foretold of by Angels and blessed by|God Himself! Surely you will triumph!
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_18_1: Surely it is you who will vanquish evil|and bring about an eternal peace in this land!
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_18_2: Surely it is you who will usher in prosperity;|the Great Prophet foretold eons ago!
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_19: We all can only do our own part, and here is mine: I will spread word|to the people, and they will take you in with kindness.
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_19_1: But they must be paid well for their efforts! We are a good people,|and we know riches and prosperity. This we will teach you!
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_1_1: They`ve been on edge since The Reckoning...
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_2: Wow, you really are new here.|Where did you come from?
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_20: You will grow in power with us. Here, this is my gift to you. |It will grant you access to the great wealth beneath your feet, deeper than many can go!
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_20_1: This will bring you gold and jewels which you can|trade with my fellow countrymen.
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_20_2: They will grow to love you, and you will grow in power, chosen one!!
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_21: Take this, and go! Develop your power,|and when you are complete, return to me.
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_21_1: I will be ready to help you.
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_21_2: There is no time to waste! Go on now!!
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_22: You are still not ready. The mission I will send you on will be treacherous!|Gather your strength and increase your power more still! Return to me when you are fully equipped.
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_23_1: There is nothing more anyone could ask of you, and you are well suited to the task. But first, I must give you this.
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_23_2: Trade it with the Potions Master, and she will get you|Thor, God of Thunder!
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_23_3: You`ll need it to defeat the adversary to come.|If you fail, return for more.
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_23_4: Surely none can defeat the Zombie Lord without it.
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_24: Hero! You must vanquish the evil from the land.
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_24_1: Our King will surely notice if you return to him with|the Soul of Contagion.
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_24_2: The Zombie Lord draws all his strength from this putrid darkness.|Slay him!
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_24_3: Return to me with his prize, and I will ensure your audience with|the King who will reward you amply. Take this also.
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_24_4: Bring it to Kevin, the Cartographer. |He will give you a map to the Zombie Lord.
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_24_5: Beware his hordes, for they will consume you, flesh and bone|if you are not careful.
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_25: ALAS!! YOU TRULY ARE THE|HERO OF THE AGES!!
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_26: Hero! I have some very grave news...|Our king has fallen ill!
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_26_1: My friends in high places have whispered to me about this.
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_26_2: Approaching him now with this would be a terrible mistake.
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_26_3: He has been a very angry King since The Reckoning.
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_27: I will send you on another adventure.
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_27_1: It takes great faith for me to tell you this...|my logic tells me you will certainly die...
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_28: It is a perilous journey, but completing it|MUST get the king`s attention!
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_28_1: My friend, Lau, and his wife, Alex have a home|just inside High Society Gardens.
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_28_2: It is a white mansion with a lovely garden just to the left of the road when you arrive.
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_28_3: They are one of the richest nobles and can sometimes turn the King`s ear.|I have told them about you, and they are eager to meet you, Hero!
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_28_4: Bring them the Soul of Contagion, and they will guide your way, Hero.
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_29: Before you go, I want to thank you from the bottom of my heart.
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_29_1: Only a great soul could conquer such a fearsome foe!
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_29_2: Take this with you. It`ll grant you access to|High Society Gardens whenever you wish.
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_5: D-Divine Dish?... May I have one?
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_6: Oh my God... This is incredible!
script.nightmarecraft.kennedy_8: It really must be you, then.|There is no other way you could be anything else...
script.nightmarecraft.kevin_1: So... yeh wanna get the Zombie Lord?
script.nightmarecraft.kevin_1_1: To the north of the castle, there`s an old goat path.
script.nightmarecraft.kevin_1_2: My map will take you only that far.
script.nightmarecraft.kevin_1_3: It`s a long and treacherous road, but it`ll get you there.
script.nightmarecraft.kevin_1_4: Follow the path until you find the goat lady`s cave.|She`ll help you get where you need to go.
script.nightmarecraft.kevin_2_1: Yes, you`re going to want a rowboat to get to him.
script.nightmarecraft.kevin_2_2: I`d say be careful, but... you killed the Zombie Lord!!
script.nightmarecraft.kevin_2_3: So, I think you`re probably good. At least, I hope so...
script.nightmarecraft.kevin_3: Crazy old Captain Marty sells rowboats.
script.nightmarecraft.kevin_3_1: You could swim the way there, or you could go talk to him. Your call, really.
script.nightmarecraft.kevin_4: Here`s a map to the Oasis, north of town. It`s on top of the highest mountain.
script.nightmarecraft.kevin_4_1: My map will take you there. Then, hop into the river and float your way to the end, just before the river`s mouth meets the ocean.
script.nightmarecraft.kevin_5_1: The river is treacherous and leads to a hole in the world.
script.nightmarecraft.kevin_5_2: Make sure you get out before then, or your journey will end there.
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.alexandra_: We have. We have lost countless neighbors and loved ones, friends, people we cared deeply about in this fight!
Many months ago, our kingdom became fed up, sick of the evil which has plagued us.
And die we did. We lost a large portion of our population.
But now you stand before us today with The Soul of Contagion!
What a kingdom could not achieve, you alone have!
What more could you be capable of?
Please, Hero, will you help us?
With all the terrible losses suffered in The Reckoning, our great king is heartbroken, and incredibly angry.
He too lost a son... The crown prince Benjamin!!
The Skeleton King and his minions will land terrible blows in battle.
Your current shield will shatter under his might.
But with a Diamond Shield you will be able to protect yourself from his attacks.
Where no one else could win, you can conquer evil and turn the tides in this war on the devil!
Ah, there you are. And what a lovely face you have!
Good luck, Hero. May you be blessed with the strength of God in battle!
Hero of the Ages.  It really is you, then, and we are all but saved.
The king will still not see you, hero.
He is a broken man. Now is not the time to try.
However, we do know The General of the Army of The People's Kingdom.
General Duncan will assist you.
Be blessed, blossoming hero.  Until next we meet!
It shines with God`s Glory and gleams with all His Might. You truly are favored indeed!
Come now young one, let us discuss matters of importance.
He is the Skeleton King, living in the northeastern snowy mountains.
His sword and his shield are mighty, and he has slain many good men.
It is because you are fierce! The fire in your eyes burns hot|from the smoldering desire for justice in your heart!
You know this world should not be darkened so!
This evil is a stain upon our land and our lives.
Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere!
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.lau_12: We have even lost our own son. He was just 19 years old|when he perished in The Reckoning.
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.lau_15: Our king felt strong, and rightfully so. This kingdom`s rage was at tipping point.
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.lau_15_1: We were ready to stand up and fight, to pay everything, and if necessary, even die.
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.lau_17: It was hopeless. Countless many were slaughtered,|and none of the seven were vanquished.
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.lau_19: We are doing something about it. We`re talking to you.
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.lau_19_1: Right now, Hero, that`s all we are capable of. |But you... you are capable of so much more...
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.lau_22: Good, and we don`t expect you to do it for free!
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.lau_22_1: But we promise you, as rich as we are, it is our great king who is the richest of all.
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.lau_22_2: You want to earn an audience with him. But right now, as you may have heard,|the price of an audience is much, much higher than usual.
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.lau_24: I will give you what you need to get a map from Kevin, and I will also give you this voucher.
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.lau_24_1: Exchange it at the Kingdom Armaments ground floor shop for a Diamond Shield [T2].
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.lau_26: He is a terrible foe, and the right-hand demon of Satan himself.
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.lau_26_1: He is bound here by the chains of misery and enslaved by an anvil of pain. Perhaps this is the key to your victory over him.
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.lau_26_2: Send him back to Nether, from where he came!
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.lau_30: Hero, before you go, leave The Soul of Contagion with us.
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.lau_30_1: If it got into the hands of The Skeleton King, his terror would reign down the mountains and begin crashing up against these very castle walls in a fortnight.
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.lau_30_2: It would be a terrible shame to risk that.
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.lau_33: You did it, I knew you would!
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.lau_34: This isn't a time to get excited, nor a time to become complacent.
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.lau_35: These two villains were a gentle warm up for what is to come.
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.lau_36: There are seven demi-gods of evil, leeching the land of our life force.
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.lau_37: General Duncan knows to expect you.
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.lau_38: Bring this with you and entrust both The Soul of Contagion and the All Seeing Eye of Evil to him for safe keeping.
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.lau_40: You will find his office in the Castle Keep above.
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.lau_5: We know why you are here.
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.lau_5_1: We also know our great King is maybe not so great anymore.|Or maybe he was never great, but I digress.
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.lau_5_2: There is another king who must be slain.|He plagues this great land.
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.lau_5_3: He is one of the seven terrors of this world. He saps the life from our kingdom and|keeps the land full of plague.
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.lau_7: You might wonder why our town would put one so innocent as you at stake.
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.lau_9: The only thing necessary for evil to triumph|is for good people to do nothing.
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.player_10: Why don`t you do something about it? Why make me?
script.nightmarecraft.mansion.voice_1: Come here Great One, let me see your face.
script.nightmarecraft.mansion_guard.no: Access here is only for government officials and nobles. Please leave.
script.nightmarecraft.mansion_guard.yes: Ah! That is a Golden Ticket! You may pass.
The Merman has left back to the shipwreck.
script.nightmarecraft.player.shield_tip: I wonder if my Diamond Shield could reflect these lasers...
script.nightmarecraft.player.shield_use_: I should use my shield to block his attacks...
script.nightmarecraft.player.skull_tip: I could use my sword to deflect the projectiles.
script.nightmarecraft.player_1: I am new here. I would like to do business with your villagers.
script.nightmarecraft.player_11: I... hope you`re not expecting that of me...|I`m just some person, I don`t even know who I am.
script.nightmarecraft.player_13: I can do with some riches...
script.nightmarecraft.player_2: I want to sell my Divine Dish in the marketplace.
script.nightmarecraft.player_4: I don`t know. I just found myself here.
script.nightmarecraft.player_5: All I remember is running from the night creatures and finding shelter.|Now I have this recipe.
script.nightmarecraft.potions.master_2: Once you imbibe Thor, God of Thunder!, your sword strikes will send bolts of lightning through crowds of mobs.
script.nightmarecraft.potions.master_3: Drink it only when the battle is upon you, for its effect is temporary.
script.nightmarecraft.potions.master_4: Take the Lightning Spark to the goat lady.
script.nightmarecraft.potions.master_5: She will have what she needs to brew you up a batch.
script.nightmarecraft.progress.crafting: Now make yourself a crafting bench from that wood.
script.nightmarecraft.progress.divine_di: Take some time to get your estate in order and develop your farm.
When you are abundant in your new superfood, take the road into town and bring some with you.
The people there will help you grow your power for the trials ahead.
script.nightmarecraft.progress.iron: Survival is only assured through strength. Craft a full suit of armor,|a proper sword and shield, and take back the house.
script.nightmarecraft.progress.stone: You`re going to need to armor up for what`s ahead. I was able to send you a copy of my old house but... there was some interference.
script.nightmarecraft.progress.stone_1: Eight dirt makes a mud oven at the crafting table.|Heat it up to make hardened dirt and turn that into cobblestone for better tools. From there you can mine for iron.
script.nightmarecraft.progress.wood: Good, now you can gather wood from trees.
script.nightmarecraft.skeleton_king.play: I should take this back to Lau and Alex.
script.nightmarecraft.skeleton_king.skel: You harbor fear in your heart.
You are not what they say you are.
Let me show you the power it has.
So the vile one has arrived to my lair...
So much greater than you are now.
Show me, show me your power, vile one!!
Your soul is sick with darkness.
Give in and Lucifer will take you in...
You must... Untether me from this place.
You are the one prophesied by Lucifer himself....
I return to Lucifer now vile one...
I will wait for you with my master in the Nether.
He will show you the way...
You must die and then you may rise!!!
You would face the King himself?
script.nightmarecraft.skeleton_king.tote: Who dares enter my domain? You will die....
What are you doing in my domain? You will die...
Why have you come here? Why are you still living? You must die...
Focus your attention on me, vile one.
Find me.... I'm waiting to kill you...
Yes.... YESS!!!!!! COME CLOSER VILE ONE!!!
COME TO ME. I'M WAITING FOR YOU....
script.nightmarecraft.unicorn.food: Before you head out, right click the chest|to find a few things I left for you.
script.nightmarecraft.unicorn.food_1: Drag some food into your inventory to keep yourself from starving.|You can access your inventory with `e` at any time.
script.nightmarecraft.unicorn.hide: 你跑不過他們。你得躲起來。|我知道前面有個地方。堅持下去！
script.nightmarecraft.unicorn.hide_insid: 快點進去，關上身後的門。
script.nightmarecraft.unicorn.run: 快跑！|（按下 W 與 左 Ctrl 鍵跑步，按空格鍵跳躍）
script.nightmarecraft.unicorn.seek_the_l: 他們走了，我已經派人去求救了。|尋找前方的光，它將指引你。
script.nightmarecraft.unicorn.shhh: 噓，不要發出聲音，否則他們會聽到你。躲在你所在的地方。
script.nightmarecraft.unicorn.sticks_1: 黑夜來臨時記得睡在床上，以避免最壞的情況發生。
script.nightmarecraft.unicorn.sticks_2: 到外面去吧，收集樹葉與樹枝。
script.nightmarecraft.unicorn.sticks_3: 你需要四根樹枝來製作一個大樹枝，並透過四根大樹枝來製作一把木斧。
script.nightmarecraft.unicorn.turn_right: 在前面，走右邊的破碎道路。
script.nightmarecraft.zombie_lord.player: 我現在應該把這個還給 Kennedy。
所以你是說我真的必須選擇一個或另一個。
你是這片美麗土地上的垃圾，你必須被消滅。
加入你們就是死亡。不，我不會加入你們。我將終結你。
你們說和平、自由與和諧，但為什麼你們帶來疾病和死亡？
因為你是腐爛和疾病本身。
但你殺死了他們。他們幾乎全軍覆沒！
那麼，為什麼不尋求溝通，以便能夠有穩定的和諧？
script.nightmarecraft.zombie_lord.zombie: 夠近了，英雄。
我只想要和平。
我只想要自由。
我只想要和諧。
疾病，死亡？我不會帶來這些東西。
人民王國帶來了這一切！
他們把戰爭和死亡帶到我的山腳下。
They spill blood.
No, Hero. I am a liberator.
我可以給你帶來更多的東西，而不是那些微不足道的人民王國和他們不存在的、無意義的「上帝」
他們的力量在哪裡？
他們派你來殺我，是嗎？
The master I serve is far greater.
He`s a man of purpose, of conviction, he`s a man of action.
當你叫他的時候，他真的出現了。
是的，Lucifer。
加入我們，英雄，讓我們來幫助你。
人民王國正在利用你的禮物。
他們不關心你，他們只關心自己。
Lucifer 是善良和慷慨的。
他賜予了我巨大的力量。
他給了我目標。
哦哦，我沒那麼壞。
He has filled me with strength.
他也能幫助你。
什麼是邪惡？那只是一種觀點。
The People`s Kingdom and its corrupt King say I`m evil, but they`re the ones coming to slaughter me and my kind.
他們才是對我發動戰爭的人。
They`re the invaders in our land.
在他們與創始人 Master Ender 到此定居之前，我們一直過著安寧的生活。
我們曾經偉大與和平的土地上出現了瘟疫與疾病
我們該怎麼做呢？我們只是在保護自己。
如果有人來到你家，試圖殺死你所關心的所有人，你會怎麼做？
你甚至不認識我，但你卻打算殺了我？
他們討厭我們只是因為我們與眾不同。
有什麼可說的呢？他們是怪獸。
They want nothing more than to destroy us and take our land for themselves.
What right do they have to this land?
They are pillagers, leeches of our wealthy land, absorbing its prosperity and getting fat and rich from their conquest.
They are evil! They will stop at nothing until we are vanquished.
There is no dialogue to be had!
Do not be fooled by their luxurious veneer, they are rotten at their core!
You are either with us, or against us!
加入我們！
A blight?! Oh heavens, no!
I am a liberator of this great and sacred place.
We will make you a great, and powerful ruler in our lands!
Join us, and we will make you strong, and victorious!
FOOL!
你必須加入我們！
YOU MUST JOIN US, OR YOU WILL DIE!
笨蛋！
INFERIOR, STUPID, INSOLENT PEST!
YOU MUST OBEY OR YOU WILL SUFFER! YOU WILL DIE!
ARISE!!
It is the People`s Kingdom who is the blight!
ARIIISSE MY MINIONS!
DO MY WILL! DESTROY THIS VERMIN INVADER!
REMOVE IT FROM OUR LANDS, AND SHOW IT SUFFERING AND SICKNESS LIKE IT HAS NEVER BEFORE SEEN!
WIPE IT FROM THE FACE OF THE WORLD!!!!
YOU WILL PAY FOR YOUR INSOLENCE, VERMIN!!!
WE WILL WIPE YOU AWAY!
DESTROY, MY PETS, ANNIIIHILATE!!!!!!
EAT ITS BRAIN, FEAST ON ITS FLESH!!!
YOU WORM, YOU DIDN`T THINK I WOULD MAKE IT THAT EASY, DID YOU?
SUFFER! BURN! ROT! DIE!!!!!!!
Of course you don`t, and why would you?
They probably got your head big and fat on their lies and their money.
YOU FILTHY, ROTTEN, DISEASE!
I WILL DEAL WITH YOU MYSELF!
I WILL PUT YOU IN THE GROUND, AND YOU WILL *NEVER* GET BACK UP!!!!
That`s all they want, more! More money, more land, more death!
但不是我，英雄
